comments.content:
It must be **[American Captain](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725043125/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=American%20Captain%20-%20Regular&fid=a6bec1c4ef2d2fd1bac5a6951f5f32a3&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=ROB-B%20WILLIAMS&fit=1)** by M.G. Adkins [The Fontry, 2010, Free for personal use]  
The erosion lines show that it's not part of the letters (probably added after the sign is completed).
You are amazing, thank you so much x
